name: Solanum, or way up and down
name_original: Solanum, or way up and down
description:
You are the last potato in the universe. Go seek the top and maybe you will find, what happened. It will not be an easy task...

Winner of a friendly game jam years ago.

Explore

Travel through many lands and environmets. Each stage have it's own unique characteristics. You will also meet some, let's say, friendly beings. Listen to their stories and you won't be that alone (maybe you don't really need to know what happened...)

Show your style and skill

Collect many skins hidden through all game. Some are hidden less and some more. You gotta catch them all (because that is the real point of the game xd)

Nothing here

You can read, there is nothing... But if you find something, I humbly sugest you to TEST it... Click'n'write...

Last advice

Don't fall ;)

I don't know if and how multiplayer works. It is outdated because it uses old Unity solution. If it is working, you can host and join custom game through UI to the top left. To play multiplayer use matchmaker. Skins don't save in multiplayer.
